LightningComponentBundle.description: Custom implementation of lightning-input where type is time

property.name: value
property.label: Value
property.description: The content in the text area.

property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: The label of the Text Area.

property.name: required
property.label: Required
property.description: If present, the time field must be filled out before the form can be submitted.

property.name: disabled
property.label: Disabled
property.description: If present, the time field is disabled and users cannot interact with it.

property.name: minValue
property.label: Min Value
property.description: If present, the time has a min value set. Must be in a form of 00:00:00.000Z

property.name: maxValue
property.label: Max Value
property.description: If present, the time has a max value set. Must be in a form of 23:59:59.000Z

property.name: requiredMessage
property.label: Required Message
property.description: Set the message to display if the field is required and not populated.
